products.title: Loretta Oyster & Spring Trimmed Roman Blind
products.description: Add a little something extra to your decor with this stunning loretta oyster roman blind and its spring coloured decorative trim of hanging tassels. ? The light fabric with all its glorious texture will complement your decor easily and make life feel a little more cosy. Bringing add a little something extra to your decor with this stunning loretta oyster roman blind and its spring coloured decorative trim of hanging tassels.

products.title: Silhouette Linen Roman Blind
products.description: A gorgeous pattern of winter trees, this silhouette design from their friends at harlequin is as iconic as it is stylish. It helps bring natural beauty into your home at the same time as upping the cosy stakes. A beautifully soft fabric and perfect folds, it feels delicate and safe a gorgeous pattern of winter trees, this silhouette design from their friends at harlequin is as iconic as it is stylish.

products.title: Amazilia Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Wow, what an absolute beauty we have here. The amazilia linen roman blind is just another example of what makes the designers at harlequin so great. Here we have gorgeous hummingbirds fluttering around blooming stems, with the soft neutral background allowing their breasts to wow, what an absolute beauty we have here.

products.title: Knightsbridge, Smoke - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a cool, neutral grey, with hints of beige, the knightsbridge in smoke offers a blank canvas for a number of decor and colour schemes. The linen-like fabric is lightweight, durable, and soft to the touch, making this blind both attractive and functional. Settle the beige mushroom smoke amidst soft, tonal blues to add a gentle neutral to tame the scheme. Together, the colours will form a coastal look, so add bleached woods and shabby chic furniture to complete the style.

products.title: Knightsbridge, Cream - Roman Blind
products.description: Just like its soft, lightweight, and linen-feel fabric, the light cream shade of the knightsbridge cream is simple and versatile. The finely woven cloth is highly durable, and is made even more so by their polycotton sateen lining, which backs all of their romans. Team the cream with soft aquas and pale taupes for a light and airy atmosphere in your guest bedroom or home study. You'll appreciate the calming influence yet will still be able to add colour with turquoises and golds.

products.title: Ahisma Luxe Faux Silk Pearl & Stone Trimmed Roman Blind
products.description: Neutral tones with a twist, this ahisma luxe faux silk pearl roman blind with its coordinated pompom trim adds a whole new element to your modern decor. ? The sleek finish of the faux silk fabric brings a luxurious finish to your window while the fun, dangling tassels add person neutral tones with a twist, this ahisma luxe faux silk pearl roman blind with its coordinated pompom trim adds a whole new element to your modern decor.

products.title: Antique White & Oyster Wooden Blind With Tapes - 64mm Slat
products.description: Such a beautiful look, this antique white and oyster wooden blind offers gentle soft colour, the faded cream slat is perfectly complemented by the darker oyster tape for complete harmony. As well as looking totally stylish this blind also offers fantastic practicality; the w such a beautiful look, this antique white and oyster wooden blind offers gentle soft colour, the faded cream slat is perfectly complemented by the darker oyster tape for complete harmony.

products.title: Ahisma Luxe Faux Silk Oyster Roman Blind
products.description: Discover a world of great taste and opulent style with the ahisma luxe faux silk oyster roman blind. Heaven in both touch and sight, this blind ticks all the right boxes when it comes to pleasing your senses. Play around with other neutral tones and natural colourways to trul discover a world of great taste and opulent style with the ahisma luxe faux silk oyster roman blind.

products.title: Ahisma Luxe Faux Silk Pearl Roman Blind
products.description: Elegant folds and sumptuous fabric dress your window with great care and finesse thanks to the ahisma luxe faux silk pearl roman blind taking pride of place. And with such a gentle offering of colour, your home will look stylish and graceful in a multitude of designs, from th elegant folds and sumptuous fabric dress your window with great care and finesse thanks to the ahisma luxe faux silk pearl roman blind taking pride of place.

products.title: Etched Vine, Sandstone - Roman Blind
products.description: On a sandy oatmeal base, the etched fern in sandstone displays intricately drawn florals in soft shades of white and charcoal, forming a delicate canvas of blossoms that will look pretty anywhere it's placed. Sit the sandstone against a deep chocolate feature wall, allowing the blind to offset the rich tone beautifully. Paint the remainder of the walls in a creamy white or barely there oatmeal, making for a cosy yet natural theme for a guest or master bedroom, or even a living room.

products.title: Maurice, Cream - Roman Blind
products.description: Fashion a luxury dcor scheme using the maurice in cream, where a lavish combination of silky threads form an elegant blind with sumptuous texture, containing a nourishing cream shade to create opulent style with a comforting and welcoming fabric. Form a grand and eye-catching theme by combining the plush cloth of the cream with alike textured materials and soft furnishings in a soothing traditional palette of cream, taupe, and gold.

products.title: Choices Kentia Linen Leaf Roller Blind
products.description: Foliage design has gone tropical with this choices kentia linen leaf roller blind. Overlapping ferns in vivid greens feels just like the depths of the rainforest, the layered canopy so beautiful overhead. We particularly love the tonal palette, giving the design a somewhat real foliage design has gone tropical with this choices kentia linen leaf roller blind.

products.title: Choices Allium Linen Papaya Roller Blind
products.description: There's something about bringing a naturally inspired pattern into your home that adds a cosy vibe, but with the warmth of the strong orange shade, this choices allium linen papaya roller blind is as cosy as they come. It's got autumnal beauty written all over it. The linen mix there's something about bringing a naturally inspired pattern into your home that adds a cosy vibe, but with the warmth of the strong orange shade, this choices allium linen papaya roller blind is as cosy as they come.

products.title: Choices Hadley Linen Ocean Roller Blind
products.description: The choices hadley linen ocean roller blind is a fresh, yet carefully cosseting option for the home, with the bold blue colourway washing a lovely linen mix fabric. This combination will ooze luxury and style as it hangs in your home, a trait that tuiss are well known for, and e the choices hadley linen ocean roller blind is a fresh, yet carefully cosseting option for the home, with the bold blue colourway washing a lovely linen mix fabric.
